section.title: companies, synchronizing of Synchronize Companies
section.para: To Synchronize Companies, select Synchronize Companies from the menu. The following screen will appear:
When synchronizing companies, you are presented with the following lists:

listitem.para: Select one or more financial periods to synchronize.
Select one or more external companies to synchronize.

section.para: Below the lists the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Selects all the contents of the list above the button.
Deselects all the contents of the list above the button.
